sentence.text: regulation of synapse assemblyKs and SSH promote cancer cell invasion and metastasis and represent novel anti-cancer targets.
However, little is known regarding regulation of synapse assemblyK/cofilin and SSH in human colorectal cancer (CRC).

We show that active cofilin, regulation of synapse assemblyK1, LIMK2, and regulation of cellular protein metabolic process are overexpressed in human CRC and are associated with tumor progression parameters.

entity.text: regulation of cellular protein metabolic process

sentence.text: In addition, immunofluorescence analysis showed increased expression of active cofilin, regulation of synapse assemblyK1, LIMK2, and regulation of cellular protein metabolic process in HT29 colon cancer cells resistant to 5-fluorouracil compared to parental HT29 cells.

entity.text: regulation of cellular protein metabolic process

sentence.text: Our results suggest that F-actin regulators regulation of synapse assemblyK/cofilin pathway and regulation of cellular protein metabolic process are associated with CRC progression and chemoresistance representing promising tumor biomarkers and therapeutic targets in CRC

entity.text: regulation of cellular protein metabolic process
